mapper.select: select book_id,booktype_name book_type,book_name,book_genre, book_price,book_pic,book_info,book_ISBN,book_author,book_publishingHouse,book_browsedTime, book_soldcount,book_stock from book left join booktype on book.book_typeid=booktype.booktype_id where book_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into book (book_genre, book_typeid, book_name, book_price, book_pic, book_info, book_ISBN, book_author, book_publishingHouse, book_browsedTime, book_stock, book_soldcount) values (#{book_genre},#{book_typeid},#{book_name},#{book_price},#{book_pic},#{book_info},#{book_ISBN}, #{book_author},#{book_publishingHouse},0,#{book_stock},0);
